verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh that I could see your face
How I'm longing for the day
Brighter sun of holy grace
make my heart a holy place

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Blessed are the poor who have nothing to own
Blessed are the mourners who are crying alone
Blesed are the guilty who have nowhere to go

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
For their hearts have a home in the Kingdom of God
And their souls are the songs of the Kingdom of God and their souls are the songs of the Kingdom of God
And they will find a refuge for theirs in the Kingdom of God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Beauty shining from your face
Always longed tro see this place
Is there somewhere I can stay?
Even justg a couple days?

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
The Lord is my shepherd we shall not want
In valley or pasture we shall not want
Our cup runneth over and over
For now and forever
For now and forever
